content.en: Speech coding advancements: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to develop high-quality speech coders at low bit rates. These algorithms, such as LPC model, M-LCELP, RCELP, CS-CELP, MBE-LPC-FE, and ATCELP, attribute agency to the methods used for speech coding and synthesis. By combining different coding techniques, such as sinusoidal coding, CELP, and waveform interpolation, these algorithms aim to achieve high-quality synthetic speech even at bit rates as low as 600 bps.
content.da: Fremskridt inden for talekodning: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at udvikle højkvalitets talekodere ved lave bithastigheder. Disse algoritmer, såsom LPC-model, M-LCELP, RCELP, CS-CELP, MBE-LPC-FE og ATCELP, tilskriver egenskaberne til de anvendte metoder for talekodning og syntese. Ved at kombinere forskellige kodningsteknikker, såsom sinusoidalkodning, CELP og bølgeformsinterpolation, sigter disse algoritmer mod at opnå højkvalitets syntetisk tale selv ved bithastigheder helt ned til 600 bps.
